original_text: Joab said, “I will not waste time like this with you.” And he took three javelins in his hand and thrust them into the heart of Absalom while he was still alive in the oak.
korean_text: 요압이 이르되 나는 너와 같이 지체할 수 없다 하고 손에 작은 창 셋을 가지고 가서 상수리나무 가운데서 아직 살아 있는 압살롬의 심장을 찌르니

sentences.original_text: I will not waste time like this with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너와 이렇게 시간을 낭비하지 않겠다.

sentences.original_text: And he took three javelins in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 손에 세 자루의 단창을 들고

sentences.original_text: and thrust them into the heart of Absalom
while he was still alive in the oak.
